author: astitcher
msg: Try to avoid getting into a state where we can't send credit because we
sent the very last buffer without any credit. So in theory when we do have
credit to send we should have a buffer and xmit credit to do it with.

author: astitcher
msg: Added asserts to ensure that we catch it if xmitCredit isn't sane

author: astitcher
msg: Allow stopping even if we've got outstanding write buffers.

author: astitcher
msg: - make sure we stop the underlying handle immediately whether or not
we do the stopped callback now or have to defer it.
- make sure that the shutdown handler is called under all circumstances.
- make sure that the destructor doesn't delete the aio if it is

author: astitcher
msg: Only set the draining flag when we delay calling the drained callback.
